statements: SELECT * FROM robo_advisor_market_data WHERE market_id = 1;
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM robo_advisor_market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM robo_advisor_market_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM robo_advisor_market_data WHERE close_price > 100;
SELECT symbol, high_price, low_price FROM robo_advisor_market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM robo_advisor_market_data WHERE symbol='AAPL' AND date='2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM robo_advisor_market_data ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT date, symbol, open_price, close_price FROM robo_advisor_market_data WHERE open_price > 100 AND close_price < 90;
SELECT AVG(close_price) AS average_close_price, MIN(low_price) AS min_low_price FROM robo_advisor_market_data;
SELECT date, symbol, high_price, low_price FROM robo_advisor_market_data WHERE market_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY date DESC, high_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalMarketData;
SELECT market_name, market_open FROM HistoricalMarketData WHERE market_close > 100;
SELECT market_id, market_date, market_open, market_close FROM HistoricalMarketData ORDER BY market_date DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_date FROM HistoricalMarketData WHERE market_open < 50 AND market_close > 80;
SELECT analysis_id, market_id, analysis_date, trend FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM HistoricalMarketData WHERE market_id = 1 ORDER BY market_date DESC;
SELECT market_id, market_name, market_open, market_close FROM HistoricalMarketData WHERE market_date >= '2022-01-01' AND market_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT market_id, market_name, market_close FROM HistoricalMarketData WHERE market_open < market_close ORDER BY market_close DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_open, market_close FROM HistoricalMarketData WHERE market_open > 100 ORDER BY market_open ASC, market_close DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrendAnalysis JOIN HistoricalMarketData ON TrendAnalysis.market_id = HistoricalMarketData.market_id WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND analysis_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM MarketData;
SELECT symbol, date, close FROM MarketData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, high, low FROM MarketData WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT id, trend_name, analysis_date FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT forecast_date, symbol, forecast_value, confidence_level FROM MarketForecast WHERE forecast_value > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date, close FROM MarketData WHERE close >= 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, AVG(close) AS avg_close FROM MarketData GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(close) > 200 ORDER BY avg_close DESC;
SELECT mt.id, mt.trend_name, mf.forecast_date, mf.forecast_value FROM MarketTrends mt INNER JOIN MarketForecast mf ON mt.id = mf.id WHERE mf.forecast_value > 150 ORDER BY mf.forecast_date ASC;
SELECT symbol, MAX(high) AS max_high FROM MarketData GROUP BY symbol HAVING MAX(high) > 500 ORDER BY max_high DESC;
SELECT * FROM Advisor;
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_email FROM Advisor WHERE advisor_id = 1;
SELECT market_price, market_date FROM MarketData ORDER BY market_date DESC;

SELECT advisor_name, trend_type, trend_score FROM Advisor JOIN MarketData ON Advisor.advisor_id = MarketData.advisor_id JOIN TrendAnalysis ON MarketData.data_id = TrendAnalysis.data_id WHERE advisor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY trend_score DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM Forecasting WHERE forecast_value > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date;
SELECT * FROM Advisor ORDER BY advisor_name DESC;
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_email FROM Advisor WHERE advisor_id = 3;
SELECT MarketData.market_price, TrendAnalysis.trend_type FROM MarketData INNER JOIN TrendAnalysis ON MarketData.data_id = TrendAnalysis.data_id WHERE TrendAnalysis.trend_score > 8;

SELECT advisor_name, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM Advisor INNER JOIN MarketData ON Advisor.advisor_id = MarketData.advisor_id INNER JOIN TrendAnalysis ON MarketData.data_id = TrendAnalysis.data_id INNER JOIN Forecasting ON TrendAnalysis.analysis_id = Forecasting.analysis_id WHERE advisor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Advisor WHERE advisor_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM MarketData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM MarketData WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT * FROM Trends WHERE trend_type='Upward' ORDER BY trend_value DESC;
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_specialization FROM Advisors;
SELECT client_name, client_age, client_investment FROM AdvisorClients WHERE advisor_id=1;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM MarketData WHERE high_price > 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC, date DESC;
SELECT AVG(open_price), MAX(close_price) FROM MarketData GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(open_price) > 50;
SELECT symbol, trend_type, trend_value FROM Trends JOIN MarketData ON Trends.symbol = MarketData.symbol WHERE trend_date = '2022-11-30';
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_specialization FROM Advisors JOIN AdvisorClients ON Advisors.advisor_id = AdvisorClients.advisor_id WHERE client_age > 40 ORDER BY advisor_name ASC;
